prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Strings, Bass, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Strings, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Strings, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, omitting the Synth Lead.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Strings, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, with no Synth Lead.
